news.title: Airlines cancel more than 1,200 flights ahead of winter storm. Here's what to know
news.description: Airlines waived change fees ahead of a large winter storm and low temperatures after the busy Christmas holiday.

news.title: Nvidia-Groq deal is structured to keep 'fiction of competition alive,' analyst says
news.description: Groq's description of its Nvidia deal as a "non-exclusive licensing agreement" mimics other recent big AI transactions orchestrated by U.S. tech giants.

news.title: Oracle shares on pace for worst quarter since 2001 as new CEOs face concerns about AI build-out
news.description: Investors want to know if Oracle, under new CEOs Clay Magouyrk and Mike Sicilia, can pay for and deliver data centers packed with Nvidia chips for OpenAI.
